Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Book = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true local vCharacter
local leftHandWeld local bookClone local spark
local bookSound
-- Coroutines local spikeCo local orbCo local rootCo
local orb local root local spike
local sgRef local frameRef local rootBtnRef local orbBtnRef local spikeBtnRef
local orbDamage = 25 local spikeDamage = 10
local spikeClone
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local spikePart = Instance.new("Part") spikePart.Size = Vector3.new(20, 4.5, 22) spikePart.Shape = "Block" spikePart.FormFactor = 3 spikePart.CanCollide = false spikePart.CFrame = spikePart.CFrame
local spikeMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") spikeMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56440892" spikeMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56441142" spikeMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) spikeMesh.Parent = spikePart
orbPart = Instance.new("Part") orbPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) orbPart.Transparency = 0.8 orbPart.Shape = "Ball" orbPart.FormFactor = 3 orbPart.Name ="Orb" orbPart.CanCollide = false
local orbPartMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") orbPartMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" orbPartMesh.Name = "Mesh" orbPartMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" orbPartMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" orbPartMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.04, 0.04, 0.04) orbPartMesh.Parent = orbPart
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Size = 0.1 fire.Heat = 5.0 fire.Color = Color3.new(139/255, 0, 139/255) fire.Parent = orbPart
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0.0, orbPart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) float.Name = "Floating"
function orbCD() wait(5) orb = Tool:FindFirstChild("Orb") if orb then orb.Value = 0 end if orbBtnRef then orbBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56465749" orbBtnRef.Active = true end end
function spikeCD() wait(3) if spikeClone then spikeClone:Remove() end if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end wait(12) spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if spike then spike.Value = 0 end if spikeBtnRef then spikeBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56465796" spikeBtnRef.Active = true end end
function rootCD() wait(15) root = Tool:FindFirstChild("Root") if root then root.Value = 0 end if rootBtnRef then rootBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56465831" rootBtnRef.Active = true end end
function blow(parent, dmg, hit) if parent then if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = player creator.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function shoot(pos) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vCharacter == nil or vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.Torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + (pos * 5.0)
orbProjectile = orbPart:Clone() orbProjectile.Name = "Orb" orbProjectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos)
floatForce = float:Clone() floatForce.Parent = orbProjectile orbProjectile.Velocity = pos * 65.0
orbProjectile.Parent = game.Workspace
orbProjectile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(orbProjectile, orbDamage, hit) end)
debris:addItem(orbProjectile, 4) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
orb = Tool:FindFirstChild("Orb") root = Tool:FindFirstChild("Root") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike")
sgRef = vPlayer.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("SpellGui") frameRef = sgRef:FindFirstChild("SpellGuiFrame")
if orb.Value == 1 or spike.Value == 1 or root.Value == 1 then
bookSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BookSound") if bookSound then bookSound:Play() end
leftArm = vCharacter["Left Arm"]
if leftArm then bookClone = Book:Clone() bookClone.Parent = vCharacter spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") spark.Color = Color3.new(139/255, 0, 139/255) spark.Parent = bookClone bookWeld = Instance.new("Weld") bookWeld.Part0 = leftArm bookWeld.Part1 = bookClone bookWeld.Name = "LeftGrip" bookWeld.Parent = leftArm bookWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1.2, 0.0, 0.0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0.0, math.pi/2) Book.Transparency = 1.0 end
if orb.Value == 1 and (orbCo == nil or coroutine.status(orbCo) == 'dead') then orbCo = coroutine.create(orbCD) coroutine.resume(orbCo) if frameRef then orbBtnRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("Orb") if orbBtnRef then orbBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56508337" orbBtnRef.Active = false end end target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint lookAt = (target - myTorso.Position).unit shoot(lookAt) elseif root.Value == 1 and (rootCo == nil or coroutine.status(rootCo) == 'dead') then rootCo = coroutine.create(rootCD) coroutine.resume(rootCo) if frameRef then rootBtnRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("Root") if rootBtnRef then rootBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56508371" rootBtnRef.Active = false end end players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] ~= vPlayer then tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar then tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempHumanoid and tempTorso then distance = (tempTorso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 30.0 then if tempChar:FindFirstChild("RootScript") == nil then newScript = Tool.RootScript:Clone() newScript.Parent = tempChar newScript.Disabled = false end end end end end end elseif spike.Value == 1 and (spikeCo == nil or coroutine.status(spikeCo) == 'dead') then spikeCo = coroutine.create(spikeCD) coroutine.resume(spikeCo) if frameRef then spikeBtnRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("Spike") if spikeBtnRef then spikeBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56508353" spikeBtnRef.Active = false end end local SpeedScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpeedScript") if SpeedScript then SpeedScript = SpeedScript:Clone() SpeedScript.Parent = vCharacter SpeedScript.Disabled = false end spikeClone = spikePart:Clone() spikeClone.CanCollide = false spikeClone.Anchored = true spikeClone.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi) spikeClone.Parent = game.Workspace spikeClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(spikeClone, spikeDamage, hit) end) end wait(4.0) spark:Remove() bookClone:Remove() Book.Transparency = 0.0 end Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if bookClone then bookClone:Remove() end Book.Transparency = 0.0 if spark then spark:Remove() end if bookSound then bookSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Book = Tool.Handle
local orb local spike local root
local sg
local vCharacter local vPlayer
-- Animations local bookAnim
function createGui() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "SpellGui" if vPlayer then sg.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui end
local frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "SpellGuiFrame" frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.35, 0) frame.Visible = true frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 70, 0, 210)
local orbBtn = Instance.new("ImageButton") orbBtn.Name = "Orb" orbBtn.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56465749" orbBtn.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) orbBtn.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) orbBtn.Parent = frame orbBtn.MouseButton1Click:connect(function() root = Tool:FindFirstChild("Root") orb = Tool:FindFirstChild("Orb") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if orb and orb.Value == 0 then orb.Value = 1 end if root and root.Value == 1 then root.Value = 0 end if spike and spike.Value == 1 then spike.Value = 0 end end)
local spikeBtn = Instance.new("ImageButton") spikeBtn.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56465796" spikeBtn.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) spikeBtn.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 70) spikeBtn.Parent = frame spikeBtn.Name = "Spike" spikeBtn.MouseButton1Click:connect(function() root = Tool:FindFirstChild("Root") orb = Tool:FindFirstChild("Orb") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if spike and spike.Value == 0 then spike.Value = 1 end if orb and orb.Value == 1 then orb.Value = 0 end if root and root.Value == 1 then root.Value = 0 end end)
local rootBtn = Instance.new("ImageButton") rootBtn.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=56465831" rootBtn.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) rootBtn.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 140) rootBtn.Parent = frame rootBtn.Name = "Root" rootBtn.MouseButton1Click:connect(function() root = Tool:FindFirstChild("Root") orb = Tool:FindFirstChild("Orb") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if root and root.Value == 0 then root.Value = 1 end if orb and orb.Value == 1 then orb.Value = 0 end if spike and spike.Value == 1 then spike.Value = 0 end end) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end bookAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BookAnim) if bookAnim then bookAnim:Play() end end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then --mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) createGui() end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

vCharacter = script.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if vCharacter ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myTorso ~= nil then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 sparkle = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkle.Color = Color3.new(139/255, 0, 139/255) sparkle.Parent = myTorso wait(3) if sparkle then sparkle:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
wait(2) script:Remove()
local Character = script.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(4) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end script:Remove()
